Pre-Game Insights: The fourth edition of the UEFA Nations League gets underway this week, where the Faroe Islands and North Macedonia will hope to get a leg up in their efforts to gain promotion from League C this year.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Lynxes make their maiden visit to Torsvollur on Saturday for what could be an all-important fixture in the final context of who ascends from Group 4 come November.
Others: Each of the other two countries in their pool – Armenia and Latvia – are newcomers to League C after they were relegated from League B and promoted from League D, respectively, last year.
